test-set.name: xp-striding-grounded-consumingC
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Grounded, RS: Consuming Any axis with nodetest that never selects anything on a child or descendant(-or-self) axis is grounded (selects nothing) and remains consuming

test-case.name: xp-striding-grounded-consumingC001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: grounded, RS: consuming Base expression: foo Separators: / With axes: any With node types: empty, error Invariant: none

test-case.name: xp-striding-grounded-consumingC002
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: grounded, RS: consuming Base expression: ex:foo Separators: / With axes: any With node types: empty, error Invariant: none
